title: China pushes back against G-7 joint statement, blames 'sinister intentions' of US, others
content:
1. China pushes back against G-7 joint statement, blames 'sinister intentions' of US, others  Fox News
  2. G7 confronts authoritarian threats from China and Russia | DW News  DW News
  3. China tells G-7 leaders 'small' groups don't rule the world on final day of summit  NBC News
  4. China’s anti-sanctions law is a defence mechanism, not an attack weapon  South China Morning Post
  5. G7 communiqué makes a show but Chinese don't buy it: Global Times editorial  Global Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
China pushes back against G-7 joint statement, blames 'sinister intentions' of US, others  Fox News
G7 confronts authoritarian threats from China and Russia | DW News  DW News
China tells G-7 leaders 'small' groups don't rule the world on final day of summit  NBC News

localize.title: 中国、G7共同声明に反発し、米国などの「邪悪な意図」を非難
中国反击七国集团联合声明，指责美国和其他国家的 "险恶用心"。
中國反擊七國集團聯合聲明，指責美國和其他國家的 "險惡用心"。
